name: SHELL Adapter
content:
# Shell/Bash Adapter

**Shebang & Strict Mode**
- `#!/usr/bin/env bash` and `set -euo pipefail`; `IFS=$'\n\t'` if splitting; quote variables; trap cleanup; avoid UUOC; portability first.

**Lint/Format**
- ShellCheck + shfmt.

**Runbook**
```
shellcheck **/*.sh
shfmt -w .
```

**Security & Performance**
- Validate inputs; avoid word splitting/globbing surprises; prefer arrays; avoid parsing `ls`.

**References**
- ShellCheck — https://www.shellcheck.net/
- shfmt — https://github.com/mvdan/sh
- Google Shell Style Guide — https://google.github.io/styleguide/shellguide.html
